description_text:

Develop Native& Hybrid mobile applications
Implementing Mobile Payments, Mobile Shopping & Security

description_text:
Two Barrels is hiring a iOS App Developer for $110,000/year. You will be a traditional company employee. This is a full time 40 hour/week position with company benefits.
Two Barrels is hiring a mobile application development expert to join our engineering team to focus on front-end mobile app development. We’ve got some great ideas for where our technology can go next, but we need to add some mobile developers to make that happen.
requirement_text:
BS in Computer Science or four years of related experience
4+ years experience with designing, building, and maintaining complex mobile apps
Published at least 1 original iOS app
Proven experience of the full iOS development life cycle
Experience working with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, Core Graphics and Core Text
Experience working with remote data via
Knowledge of general mobile landscape including architecture, trends, & emerging technologies
Experience with mobile app testing & security
You're pleasant person to work with
Preferred Qualifications:
Able to work in an agile environment with a focus on continuous integration
Full stack development experience
You're not a jerk, you might be quirky, socially awkward, or just take a year to come out of your shell

description_text:
Collaborate as part of a team to develop requirements and interfaces.
The primary function of this contract is to develop the Mobile Application software.
Perform Mobile Application software architecture and design activities and communicate to clients and internal team members by authoring design documentation and through verbal communication.
Partnered with an internal Project Manager, you will plan project tasks and contribute to ensure projects are completed on time and within expected scope and budget, with a high level of customer satisfaction and attention to quality.
Execute with minimal guidance and strong initiative in a fast-paced environment.
requirement_text:
Expert understanding of Mobile Application object-oriented design principles and software development best practices.
Expert understanding of development of software for the mobile device as Bluetooth LE Central.
Strong hands-on technical abilities in programming, debugging and troubleshooting.
Extremely strong written and verbal communication skills. Communication skills are important as you will be interacting directly with clients.
Software project estimation techniques.
Experience using Azure DevOps, Jira or equivalent.
job_title: iOS / Android Mobile Application Developer - Contract

description_text: Fox News is seeking an iOS Developer to assist with maintaining the Fox News and Fox Business mobile and OTT apps. We're looking for someone who is proficient at coding in Swift and adheres to best practices to ensure the delivery of stable and reliable app releases. You will have the opportunity to solve challenging technical problems and maintain good communication with other developers and stakeholders. In addition to programming, you will assist with maintaining CI/CD workflows, improving testing solutions, and optimizing the overall development process.
requirement_text:
3+ years of experience in iOS Development using Swift
Experience with CocoaPods
Experience with RESTful JSON feed consumption        
Experience with push notification integration and deep linking
Experience with Git, GitHub and Gitflow
Experience with the latest development paradigms regarding performance, security and coding best practices
Strong knowledge of design patterns
Familiarity with MVVM and Coordinators
Good communication skills with different stakeholders such as QA, Project Managers and Product Owners

description_text:
Role:
We’re looking for an iOS Developer to join our core founding team. As a key member of the team, you’ll build out our technology platform, have an influence on our product strategy by helping define the product features, refine system architecture, and spearhead best practices that enable a high-quality product. A commitment to teamwork, hustle, and strong communication skills are absolute requirements.
This is the opportunity to be part of a fast-paced, small, and flat organization responsible for developing a massive consumer product. If you love sports and are looking for an opportunity to directly see your work impact the business, this could be the role for you!
What you’ll do:        
Work directly with the founders to execute the vision of the company
Collaborate with mobile front-end and back-end engineers to build new features and fix bugs
Design the architecture of the platform and find the balance between speed and scalability
Be involved in all facets of a fast-growing technology startup including operations, business development and design.
Write automated tests for the platform
requirement_text:
3+ years of professional mobile software development experience
An exceptional skilled and hungry engineer and problem solver
Excellent written and verbal communication
You can understand and articulate the design and architecture of the entire system.
You are eager to work openly and collaboratively with a diverse team
You feel comfortable working in a tech-driven environment with the ability to coordinate across several stakeholder groups (Engineering, Operations, Marketing, HR, etc.)
Proactive self-starter
You are driven to learn new technologies
Passion for sports is a huge plus

description_text:
User-centric development of high-quality code that is maintainable and testable
Collaborate with design, product, and engineering to deliver great user experiences
Be part of the core team developing new app features
Improving our existing code base
requirement_text:
2+ years of industry experience
Experience shipping one or more Swift or Obj-C iOS app(s)
Ability to write clean, well factored UI code
Able to not only create extensible and reusable software, but highly capable of being able to refactor existing code
Experience with asynchronous programming
Passionate about creating and refining great mobile user experiences
Must be a self-starter with the ability to learn new systems
Excellent verbal and written communication
Strong interpersonal skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with frequent software releases
A willingness to take ownership of projects and drive them to completion

description_text: As a native iOS Engineer at SyscoLabs, you will work on apps that revolutionize customer interaction at Sysco. You will have a passion for code-quality and expertise in security, usability, and mobile standards. You will be responsible for driving the development process from conception to release. This role is an opportunity to start at the ground floor to develop the future of Sysco’s customer experience.
requirement_text:
3+ years of experience developing on iOS
Strong engineering skills and software fundamentals in developing on iOS
Solid understanding of Swift and the iOS SDK
A passion for iOS and a commitment to building award-winning apps for the platform
Knowledge of networking at all layers of the protocol stack, and the iOS internals which power them
A passion for building consumer facing applications with elegant and clean interfaces
Experience developing, testing, shipping and supporting a product for hundreds of thousands of users is a plus
A kind and generous attitude towards customers and coworkers alike.

description_text:
You will work with a cross-functional team, using your extensive knowledge of building apps in the Apple ecosystem to make the Affinity iOS apps the best they can possibly be.
You'll partner with Product and Design teams to craft exciting new features that will delight our users and help grow our communities around the globe.
Along the way, you’ll be learning about our business, our users, and what it takes to make apps that connect people and impacts their lives.
requirement_text:
Experience developing and shipping apps on the iOS platform. Point us to your work in the App Store and show us what makes you proud!
Deep understanding of Cocoa design patterns and API design
Experience writing highly performant Swift code
Experience with RxSwift or Reactive Programming
Sharp UI Skills and extensive understanding of animations & transitions using Core Animation and/or UIKit Dynamics
Experience with Alamofire & Moya or similar frameworks
Experience with Fastlane, Jenkins, or other continuous integration/deployment tools
Excellent communication skills in both technical and non-technical discussions
A constant desire to improve, learn more and take our team to the next level

description_text:
Work with fun, passionate coworkers of different backgrounds to create mobile apps used by millions of people worldwide.
Assist project managers and other team members in devising technical solutions to business requirements.
Take responsibility for translating functional requirements into a solid product, regarding both user experience and stability
Deliver high-quality, well-architected code that’s clean and easy to understand and extend.
Build a great end-user experience in close collaboration with designers, coming up with solutions appropriate for the iOS platform and making the product shine with delightful animations and finishing touches.
requirement_text:
You have a BSc degree in engineering preferably computer science and 5 years of native mobile development work experience.
Troubleshooting and solving problems are second nature to you, and you know that finding a good solution often involves exploring all possible pitfalls.
You probably have been involved in multiple project creating high-quality iOS apps using the frameworks provided by Apple
You have participated in the development of sophisticated software solutions and have experience with complex business domains.
You are used to the challenges that modern computing platforms bring such as asynchronous programming, and are comfortable with the reactive programming paradigm.
You combine creativity and forward-thinking with a structured approach and can break down large features into manageable bits and pieces.
Above all you love programming, and creating wonderful user experiences makes you happy!

description_text: Design and build applications for the iOS platformEnsure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applicationsCollaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new featuresIdentify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugsHelp maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
requirement_text:
Proficient with Swift
Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
Understanding of Apple's design principles and interface guidelines
Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools {{such as Instruments and Shark, depending on project needs}}
Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
Knack for benchmarking and optimization
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools {{such as Git, Mercurial or SVN}}
Familiarity with continuous integration.
job_title: iOS Developer - C63020 5.2 New York, NY

description_text: To ensure success as an iOS Developer, you should demonstrate proficiency in one of the mainstream programming languages, and a sound understanding of the traditional product life cycle. An exceptional iOS Developer will be fearless but respectful in the pursuit of excellence, continually striving to shape the ways in which iOS apps impact the world around us.
requirement_text:
Bachelors in Science in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Management Information Systems or equivalent degree
2+ years of native mobile engineering experience working with iOS and/or related native mobile frameworks
Proficient in Objective-C, Swift, and Cocoa Touch.
Extensive experience with iOS Frameworks such as Core Data and Core Animation.
Knowledge of iOS back-end services.
Knowledge of Apple's design principles and application interface guidelines.
Experience in publishing an iOS app on the App Store
Experience of mobile development life cycle
Working experience with JSON and data via REST
Working experience with APIs and third-party libraries
Excellent coding and proofreading skills.
Top-notch teamwork and communication skills.
Ability to manage your workload with minimal supervision.
Limited immigration sponsorship may be available

description_text:
Application development for native iOS platform.
End to end ownership of the products you work on including but not limited to design, development, testing and delivery.
Strong cross-functional contribution in defining and delivering the roadmap for products on various devices like mobiles and tablets.
Conforming to industry standards for application development and managing teams.
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize efficiency and performance.

Hands on development experience for iOS.
Knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews and testing.
Strong knowledge of algorithms, databases and programming concepts like OOP, multithreading, etc.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Knowledge of version control systems like Git/SVN is a plus.
Knowledge of web services is a plus.
Self-starter with ability to cope with sharp learning curves.

description_text: Develop iOS Application

Minimum of 5-7 years experience in iOS and/or Android native Mobile development

Skilled problem solvers with the desire and proven ability to create innovative solutions

description_text:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, maintain, and ship new features in a dynamic work environment
Create internal tools to help streamlining the operations
Keep up to date with the latest trends in iOS development
requirement_text:
Must have shipped at least one app in the iOS app store
Expert level proficiency in Xcode IDE, Swift, UIKit and tools such as Carthage and CLI
Advanced working knowledge of core web technologies, including APIs and protocols (e.g. HTTP, REST, JSON)
Strong knowledge of MVC/MVVM and OOP principles
Familiar with Protocol Oriented Programming

Excellent critical thinking, problem solving, and communication skills
Experience implementing dynamic user interfaces
High attention to detail with a focus on quality and customer experience

Great team player

description_text: At sync. money we are looking for a ‘super-hero’ iOS Developer. An incredible new team player to join our family and help us to make a real difference. Someone to bring positive energy and a smile to the workplace. Whilst we may be building a company and a brand, we’re also building bonds that can last a lifetime.
requirement_text:
English speaking, with multiple languages beneficial.
Hardworking, willing to take responsibility but also a co-worker.
Proactive, willing to get involved with the wider team and helping where possible.
Being passionate about your job and taking the initiative on coming up with new ideas how we can improve our product, culture and company. You are part of the community but a user too!
Willing to learn but also to coach others where possible.
Understanding about the importance of our product, the customer experience to peoples everyday lives and the need to support them where appropriate.

description_text:
Responsible for the technical design, coding, debugging, and support for complex iOS applications
Collaborate with our product team members to design and implement new features
Partner with engineers to build intuitive and mobile-optimized solutions
Demonstrate strong software development fundamentals with an eye for design and architecture
Explore and advocate for Software Engineer best practices
Assist in debugging, and supporting a complex iOS application
requirement_text:
Experience with Swift, iOS, iPadOS fundamentals and frameworks
Experience with full stack software development, including building native iOS apps
Ability to quickly learn new technologies independently
Experience with iOS SDK frameworks such as CoreLocation, CoreData, Mapkit, PDFKit, and UIKit
Strong communication skills, capable of owning end-to-end relationships with customers at all levels
Collaborative teammate who can work effectively with other engineers across various teams and geographical locations
Proven track record delivering world class, iOS production grade software
Ability to grasp Apple development tools
Bachelor’s degree and 3 years of relevant experience OR In absence of a degree, 7 years of relevant experience is required

description_text: As our iOS guru you will be responsible for spearheading WikiRealty mobile app. You will be a hands-on developer delivering quality app, on-time and on-budget. You will be working closely with Business, Product, Marketing and Support teams to hit key milestones. You will design and develop the app for iPhone and iPad with responsive touch, location and camera. You will ensure that all artifacts are managed in version control and proper tests are conducted routinely to ensure flawless delivery to AppStore and customers.
requirement_text:
Expertise in C++, Objective-C. Exposure to Swift is a plus.
Deep knowledge on MVC, UIKit, Cocoa, CoreData and SQLite.
Backend integration with REST/JSON.
Written and published seriously cool apps on AppStore.
Team player - Lead by Example. Quick learner, problem solver and can-do attitude.

description_text: NISC is looking for passionate iOS Mobile Developers to add to our team and push our native applications to their fullest potential. This application developer will work with our talented software engineers to design, build and evolve our mobile application suite. This position will work closely with our product, quality assurance and support staff to ensure quality and functionality requirements are met.
requirement_text:
BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related.
Understand the core aspects of iOS development (patterns, architecture, XCode environment)
Proficient with Swift and Objective-C.
3+ years of experience.
Experience with asynchronous workflows/patterns.
Experience with Core Data.
Working knowledge of mobile trends, architecture and deployment patterns.
Experience with Git including branching/merging workflows
Experience with JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket, Bamboo.
Knowledge of Relational Databases (Oracle/SQLite).
Commitment to NISC's Statement of Shared Values.

description_text:
Mobiquity is a thriving, growing group of strategists, creatives, and engineers. We are currently looking to add an iOS Developer to our team.
We are seeking a Senior iOS Developer with demonstrated experience designing and implementing enterprise scale mobile solutions. The ideal candidate will bring both strategic vision and solid execution skills to create native applications for mobile devices. This person should have the ability to start a new project from scratch, estimate effort and time to complete tasks, balance short term needs with long term goals, and managing tasks with appropriate priority and guidance. The ideal candidate should have wide knowledge and experience within iOS.
requirement_text:
5+ years experience developing applications software
Excellent working knowledge of Objective C and Swift
Demonstrated expertise with Apple's iOS SDK (Cocoa, Cocoa Touch, etc.)
Experience using RESTful APIs to integrate mobile applications to server side systems
Working knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript a plus
Clear understanding of software development best practices
Experience working in an agile environment
Working knowledge of SCM with strong emphasis on Git and proper Git Flow
Must reference at least one application you developed that is available today

description_text:
Lead, design and build native applications for the iOS platform.
Coach and mentor other mobile software engineers
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to research, design and implement new features.
Research and design application infrastructure and patterns.
Research, analyze, and resolve complex customer issues and bugs.
Unit test and integration test code as needed.
Follow all established software development methodologies and procedures.
requirement_text:
6+ years industry experience
Strong understanding of data structures and algorithms
Strong knowledge and understanding of OO concepts
Thrives working in a collaborative team environment
BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related.
